name: Time's running out
description:
This is a micro game collection created at a Game Jam with the topic "Blue planet".
The idea is to create a sense of urgency to react on climate crisis.

It was a two-day jam and we compensated taking a guided tour to the lovely town of Lutherstadt Wittenberg during the jam with some polishing afterwards.

Team: Christoph Plewe, Markus Kohle, Daniel Gehn, Björn Lilleike, Holger Becker

Music, Sound- andVoice-Effects: Lara Keilbart
